CustomField.description: A formula field that takes the Carrier and the effective date to calculate what the correct binder year is.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Lloyd"), Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2018, 1, 1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2020, 3, 31) ), "BY1", IF( AND( CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Lloyd"), Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2020, 4, 1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2021, 1, 31) ), "BY2", IF( AND( CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Lloyd"), Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2021, 2, 1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2021, 12, 31) ), "BY3", IF( AND( CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Lloyd"), Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2022, 1, 1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2023, 3, 31) ), "BY4", IF( AND( CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Lloyd"), Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2023, 4, 1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2024, 3, 31) ), "BY5", IF( AND( CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Lloyd"), Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2024, 4, 1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2025, 3, 31) ), "BY6", IF( AND( OR( CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Trisura"), CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Bricktown") ), Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2022, 5, 1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2023, 4, 30) ), "BY1", IF( AND( OR( CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Trisura"), CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Bricktown") ), Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2023, 5, 1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2024, 4, 30) ), "BY2", IF( AND( OR( CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Trisura"), CONTAINS(Carrier_Issuing_Company__r.Name, "Bricktown") ), Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2024, 5, 1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2025, 4, 30) ), "BY3", "NA" ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Binder Year (Formula)
